Package org.gradle.api.artifacts

Interface ResolvableConfiguration

All Superinterfaces:
AntBuilderAware, Buildable, Configuration, FileCollection, HasAttributes, HasConfigurableAttributes<Configuration>, Iterable<File>, Named
@Incubating public interface ResolvableConfiguration extends Configuration
A Configuration which performs dependency resolution to build dependency graphs and resolve artifacts.
Since:
8.4
